attributes.action: Hold a national inquiry into grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: it's horrified me to the point I feel I must try to do something to try to  ease survivors pain
attributes.background: To push the government to hold a national inquiry, to give survivors ,  families, whistleblowers and campaigners the right to have their voices heard and have the justice and peace  they deserve .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
